.et_pb_menu__menu nav .et-menu > li > ul {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      animation: none;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      opacity: 0;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      transition: opacity 0.4s ease-in !important;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  /* visible submenu */<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  .dvcs-item-enter > .sub-menu {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      display: block;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  .dvcs_smooth_submenus .et_pb_menu__menu nav .et-menu > .dvcs-item-enter-active > .sub-menu,<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  .dvcs_smooth_submenus .dvcs-item-enter-active > .sub-menu {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      opacity: 1;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  /* submenu background wrapper */<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  .dvcs_submenu_bg_wrapper {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      position: absolute;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      z-index: 1;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      pointer-events: none;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  .dvcs_submenu_bg_wrapper.dvcs-animatable {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      /* transition: transform 0.2s; */<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      transition: all 0.4s ease;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      transform-origin: 50% 0;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  .dvcs_submenu_bg_wrapper:not(.dvcs-animatable) {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      pointer-events: none;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  /* submenu background */<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  .dvcs_free_header_9 .dvcs_submenu_bg {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      width: 150px;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      height: 100px;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      position: absolute;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      left: 50%;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      transform: translateX(-50%);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      background: #fff;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      border-radius: 10px;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      box-shadow: 0px 2px 18px 0px rgb(0 0 0 / 10%);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      transition: all 0.2s, opacity 0.1s, transform 0.1s;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      transform-origin: 50% 0;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      display: flex;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      justify-content: center;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      opacity: 0;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  .dvcs_submenu_bg.dvcs_open {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      opacity: 1;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  /* submenu background arrow */<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  .dvcs_free_header_9 .dvcs_arrow {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      position: absolute;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      width: 7px;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      height: 7px;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      display: block;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      border-radius: 2px;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      background: #2c3333;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      transform: translateY(-50%) rotate(45deg);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      pointer-events: none;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  /* END Submenu background and arrow */<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  /* Menus CSS */<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  /* first level submenus */<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  .dvcs_smooth_submenus .et_pb_menu__menu nav .et-menu > li > ul {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      left: 50%;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      transform: translate(-50%, 0) translateZ(0);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      background-color: transparent !important;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  /* remove submenu box-shadow */<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  .dvcs_smooth_submenus .nav li ul {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      box-shadow: none !important;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  /* remove parent item arrow */<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  .dvcs_smooth_submenus .et-menu > li.menu-item-has-children > a:after {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      content: "" !important;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  /* parent item link */<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  .dvcs_smooth_submenus .et-menu > li > a {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      padding-left: 10px !important;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      padding-right: 10px !important;<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  /* END Menus CSS */<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  /* END SMOOTH SUBMENUS EFFECT CSS */<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --></style><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><script><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  /**<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->   * SMOOTH SUBMENUS EFFECT FOR DIVI DESKTOP MENU.<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->   * @author		Ivan Chiurcci<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->   * @site  		https://www.divicio.us/tutorials/menu/create-the-smooth-submenus-effect-for-divi-desktop-menu/<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->   */<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  window.dvcsSmoothSubmenus = {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    /**<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * Create the submenu background element<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * and insert it into the menu <nav> element before <ul> element.<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * @param {HTMLelement}    nav     Menu <nav> element.<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * @param {HTMLelement}    ul      Menu <ul> element.<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     */<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     createSubmenuBg: function(nav, ul){<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        // create submenu background element<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        let submenuBgWrapper = document.createElement("div"),<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            submenuBg = document.createElement("div"),<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            arrow     = document.createElement("span");<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        // add CSS classes<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        submenuBgWrapper.classList.add("dvcs_submenu_bg_wrapper");<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        submenuBg.classList.add("dvcs_submenu_bg");<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        arrow.classList.add("dvcs_arrow");<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        // insert into menu<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        nav.insertBefore(submenuBgWrapper, ul);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        submenuBgWrapper.appendChild(submenuBg);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        submenuBg.appendChild(arrow);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    },<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    /**<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * Handle the submenu bakcground on menu item mouse enter.<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * Shows the submenu background when the parent menu item is hovered over<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * and updates it's coordinates and size values accordingly.<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * @param {HTMLelement} item                The menu item that is currently hovered over.<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * @param {HTMLelement} nav                 Menu <nav> element.<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * @param {HTMLelement} submenuBgWrapper    Submenu background wrapper.<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * @param {HTMLelement} submenuBg           Submenu background.<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     */<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    handleEnter: function(item, nav, submenuBgWrapper, submenuBg){<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        // coordinates of the current submenu and menu <nav> element<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        const submenu      = item.querySelector('.sub-menu'),<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->              submenuRect  = submenu.getBoundingClientRect(),<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->              navRect       = nav.getBoundingClientRect();<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        // submenu background values<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        const bg = {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            height: submenuRect.height,<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            width: submenuRect.width,<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            top: submenuRect.top - navRect.top,<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            left: submenuRect.left - navRect.left<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        };<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        // add CSS classes<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        item.classList.add('dvcs-item-enter');<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        setTimeout(() => item.classList.contains('dvcs-item-enter') && item.classList.add('dvcs-item-enter-active'), 150);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        submenuBg.classList.add('dvcs_open');<!-- submenuBgWrapper.style.setProperty('transform', `translate(${bg.left}px, ${bg.top}px)`);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        submenuBgWrapper.style.setProperty('width', `${bg.width}px`);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        submenuBgWrapper.style.setProperty('height', `${bg.height}px`);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        // set the submenu },<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    /**<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->       * Handle the submenu background when mouse enters the menu <ul> element.<!-- submenuBgWrapper.classList.remove('dvcs-animatable');<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->          // remove the submenu background properties<!--      },<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      /**<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->       * Handle the "smooth submenus" effect.<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> .et_mobile_menu .menu-item-has-children:not(.clickable) > a:after,<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->  .et_pb_module .et_mobile_menu .menu-item-has-children.clickable > span.parent_icon:after {<!-- --></style><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><script type="text/javascript"><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->(function($) {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    /**<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * Collapse Divi mobile menu submenus.<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     *<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * Works for both the Menu and the Fullwidth Menu modules.<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * The parent item links can be either disabled or clickable.<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * @author		Ivan Chiurcci<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * @site  		https://www.divicio.us/tutorials/how-to-collapse-divi-menu-module-submenus-and-keep-parent-links-clickable-on-mobile-devices/<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     *<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * @param  bool  parentClickable    Pass true to keep the parent menu item links clickable. Default: false.<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     */<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    function dvcs_collapse_menu_module_submenus_on_mobile(parentClickable = false) {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      // Mobile menu<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      let $menu = $('.et_pb_module .et_mobile_menu');<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      // Iterate the mobile menu links<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      $menu.find('a').each(function() {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      // Menu hamburger icon<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      let $menu_icon = $(this).parents('.mobile_nav').find('.mobile_menu_bar');<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      // Remove click event handlers from the link<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      $(this).off('click');<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      // If the menu item DOESN'T HAVE submenus<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      if( ! $(this).siblings('.sub-menu').length ) {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        // Close the mobile menu on link click<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        $(this).on('click', (e) => $menu_icon.trigger('click'));<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      } else {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        // If parent items links are DISABLED<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        if( ! parentClickable ){<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->          // Replace the URL with the # symbol<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->          $(this).attr('href', '#');<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->          // Open/close the submenu on link click<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->          $(this).on('click', (e) => toggle_visible(e, $(this).parent()));<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        } else {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->          // Add the "clickable" class to the parent(<li> tag)<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->          $(this).parent().addClass('clickable')<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            // Prepend the icon to parent<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            .prepend('<span class="parent_icon"></span>')<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            // Open/close the submenu on icon click<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            .find('.parent_icon').on('click', (e) => toggle_visible(e, $(this).parent()));<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->          // Link click<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->          $(this).on('click', function(e){<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            // Toggle the submenu if the link doesn't have a URL or anchor<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            if ( $(this).attr('href') === '#' ) {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->              toggle_visible(e, $(this).parent());<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            } else {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->              // Close the mobile menu<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->              $menu_icon.trigger('click');<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->            }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->          });<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->        }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    });<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    /**<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * Toggles the 'visible' class on passed element.<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     */<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    const toggle_visible = (e, elem) => {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      e.preventDefault();<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->      elem.toggleClass('visible');<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->   }<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    $(function() {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->    /**<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * Call the function with a delay to allow<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * the mobile menu(s) be ready first.<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     * To keep parent links clickable pass true (boolean) as argument.<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     */<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     setTimeout(function() {<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->         dvcs_collapse_menu_module_submenus_on_mobile(false);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->     }, 700);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->   });<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->})(jQuery);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --></script>[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_4" _builder_version="4.22.0" _module_preset="default"
